body.p:
Frankfort Ky. Nov. 3rd 1861
To his Excellency
Governor Beriah Magoffin

The undersigned your petitioners pray that you will remit a fine assessed aginst William P. Watson of this City on a charge of disorderly conduct, Said fine in the opinion of your pettioners is excessive excessive amounting, ^to ten dollars^ with costs as it to $13.75 and as the offense injured no one, therefore they pray Executive clemency

Very Respectfully
J H Johnson
W. L. Harlan
J A Crittenden
John M Todd
James M Todd
S Sanders
E P Bowman
J. W. Pruett
A. C. Keenor
R K Woodson

$10 } Breach
Wm P. Watson
Issd. Nov 19. 1861
